name: Apprentus
tag_list: teach, teaching, teachers, learn, learning, education, lessons, appointments, students, clients, schools, classes
overview:
Apprentus is a social marketplace for people to list, discover, and book unique classes and teachers around the world.

Whether for math tutoring, guitar lessons or yoga classes, Apprentus connects students to unique teaching experiences at any price point.

And with a growing community of users, Apprentus is the easiest way for talented people to monetize their skills and showcase them to an audience of millions.
